analyzed: gtor ma'i cho ga
translated: The Ritual of the Torma

analyzed: @_dpal sgyu 'phrul chen mo'i gtor ma'i cho ga bzhugs so//_@##/_/rgya

analyzed: gar skad du/_shri ma ha ma ya sa ma ya ba li bi d+ha/_bod skad du/_dpal sgyu
translated: In Sanskrit: Śrī-mahāmāyā-samājavidhi🔽In Tibetan: The Ritual of the Torma of the Great Illusion

original: 'phrul chen mo'i gtor ma'i cho ga_/dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshhal lo/_/
analyzed: 'phrul chen mo'i gtor ma'i cho ga_/dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshhal lo/_/
translated: Homage to the Three Jewels!

original: skad cig tsham gyis stong par bsams la/_de nas hum brjod de/_hum las skad
analyzed: skad cig tsham gyis stong par bsams la/_de nas hum brjod de/_hum las skad
translated: Having contemplated emptiness in an instant, then uttering hūṃ, from hūṃ,

original: cig tsham gyis rdo rje'i sa gzhi dang /_ra ba dang dra ba'i nang du khams gsum gyi
analyzed: cig tsham gyis rdo rje'i sa gzhi dang /_ra ba dang dra ba'i nang du khams gsum gyi
translated: in an instant, the vajra ground, fence, and tent are generated.

original: sems can thams cad dur khrod brgyad dang bcas pa'i lha'i dkyil 'khor du🔽bskyed la/_bdag nyid kyang mdun du he ru ka'i gzugs su byas la/_yi ge
analyzed: sems can thams cad dur khrod brgyad dang bcas pa'i lha'i dkyil 'khor du bskyed la/_bdag nyid kyang mdun du he ru ka'i gzugs su byas la/_yi ge
translated: Within, all sentient beings of the three realms are generated as the maṇḍala of deities together with the eight charnel grounds.

original: 'bru drug pa dang /_'bru gsum pa dang /_cod pan gyi lha dran pas bsrung
analyzed: 'bru drug pa dang /_'bru gsum pa dang /_cod pan gyi lha dran pas bsrung
translated: Also, in front of oneself, one should make the form of Heruka and protect oneself with the six syllables, the three syllables, and the crown ornament deity.

original: bar bya'o/_/de'i 'og tu yi dang ram la rlung dang me bskyed la/_a las thod pa
analyzed: bar bya'o/_/de'i 'og tu yi dang ram la rlung dang me bskyed la/_a las thod pa
translated: Then, below that, one should generate the wind and fire from yaṃ and raṃ, and from a, a skull cup.

original: bskyed/_de'i nang du sha lnga dang bdud rtshi lnga bsam/_de'i steng gi bar snang
analyzed: bskyed/_de'i nang du sha lnga dang bdud rtshi lnga bsam/_de'i steng gi bar snang
translated: Generate the five meats and five nectars inside of that.🔽In the space above that, generate a vajra from hūṃ on a moon.

original: la zla ba'i steng du hum las rdo rje bskyed/_rlung gis me sbar mes bdud rtshi bskol
analyzed: la zla ba'i steng du hum las rdo rje bskyed/_rlung gis me sbar mes bdud rtshi bskol
translated: The wind ignites the fire, and the fire melts the nectar.

original: ba'i 'od kyis zla ba dang rdo rje yang thim nas lha'i bdud rtshir gyur te/_de'i steng
analyzed: ba'i 'od kyis zla ba dang rdo rje yang thim nas lha'i bdud rtshir gyur te/_de'i steng
translated: The light from that dissolves the moon and vajra, and they become the nectar of the deity.🔽On top of that, imagine oṃ.

original: du a+o~m bsam/_de'i 'od zer gyis ye shes kyis bdud rtshi bkug ste bstims la yi
analyzed: du a+o~m bsam/_de'i 'od zer gyis ye shes kyis bdud rtshi bkug ste bstims la yi
translated: The light rays from that invoke the nectar of timeless awareness, which is absorbed.

original: ge 'bru gsum gyis sngags lan gsum bzlas pas byin gyis brlab po/_/de nas
analyzed: ge 'bru gsum gyis sngags lan gsum bzlas pas byin gyis brlab po/_/de nas
translated: Bless it with the three-syllable mantra recited three times.

original: snying kha'i sa bon gyi 'od zer gyis ye shes kyis bdud rtshi spyan drangs nas/_a+o~m shri🔽he ru ka ma ha badzra a gad ta ya a gad ta ya/_pra be sha ya pra be sha ya b+han d+ha ya
analyzed: snying kha'i sa bon gyi 'od zer gyis ye shes kyis bdud rtshi spyan drangs nas/_a+o~m shri he ru ka ma ha badzra a gad ta ya a gad ta ya/_pra be sha ya pra be sha ya b+han d+ha ya
translated: Then, the light rays from the seed syllable in the heart invoke the nectar of timeless awareness.

original: b+han d+ha/_to sha ya to sha ya/_sarba badzra d+ha ki ni na ma/_hri da hu~m hu~m phat phat/
analyzed: b+han d+ha/_to sha ya to sha ya/_sarba badzra d+ha ki ni na ma/_hri da hu~m hu~m phat phat/
translated: oṃ śrī heruka mahāvajra agadāya agadāya praveśaya praveśaya bhandāya bhandāya toṣaya toṣaya sarva-vajra-ḍākinī-nam ha hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ phaṭ

original: zhes brjod pas dam tshhig dkyil 'khor la bstims la/_yid las byung ba'i🔽mchod pa rnams kyis mchod do/_/de nas lha rnams dang dur khrod brgyad kyi
analyzed: zhes brjod pas dam tshhig dkyil 'khor la bstims la/_yid las byung ba'i mchod pa rnams kyis mchod do/_/de nas lha rnams dang dur khrod brgyad kyi
translated: Having said that, dissolve the pledge mandala into the mandala of the deities, and make offerings with the offerings arisen from the mind.

original: bdag mo rnams kyi lce la hum las rdo rje nas 'bru tsham bsams la/_de'i rtshe mor🔽hum bsgoms te/_de'i 'od zer gyis bdud rtshi drangs nas/_gsol bas gnyis
analyzed: bdag mo rnams kyi lce la hum las rdo rje nas 'bru tsham bsams la/_de'i rtshe mor hum bsgoms te/_de'i 'od zer gyis bdud rtshi drangs nas/_gsol bas gnyis
translated: Then, on the tongues of the deities and the mistresses of the eight charnel grounds, imagine that from hūṃ there is a vajra the size of a chickpea.🔽At that time, meditate on hūṃ, and imagine that light rays draw the nectar and that by drinking it, the wisdom of nonduality is attained.

original: su med pa'i ye shes thob par bsam mo/_/sngags ni/_om omshri he ru ka ma ha🔽badzra bra titsh+tshha mam b+ha lo hum phat/_om bud d+ha d+ha ki ni pra titsh+tshha mam b+ha lo om phat/
analyzed: su med pa'i ye shes thob par bsam mo/_/sngags ni/_om omshri he ru ka ma ha badzra bra titsh+tshha mam b+ha lo hum phat/_om bud d+ha d+ha ki ni pra titsh+tshha mam b+ha lo om phat/
translated: The mantras are: oṃ oṃ śrī heruka mahā🔽vajra pratīccha ha maṃ bhalohūṃ phaṭ🔽oṃ buddha dakini pratīccha ha maṃ bhalom oṃ phaṭ🔽oṃ vajra dakini pratīccha ha maṃ bhaloliṃ hūṃ phaṭ🔽oṃ ratna dakini pratīccha ha maṃ bhalitram phaṭ🔽oṃ padma dakini pratīccha ha maṃ bhalis hreḥ phaṭ

original: om badzra d+ha ki ni pra ti_me b+ha lo lim hum phat/_a+o~m rat+na d+ha ki ni pra titsh+tshha me b+ha li tram phat/
analyzed: om badzra d+ha ki ni pra ti_me b+ha lo lim hum phat/_a+o~m rat+na d+ha ki ni pra titsh+tshha me b+ha li tram phat/
translated: oṃ karma dakini pratīccha ha maṃ bhaloh phaṭ

original: om pad+ma d+ha ki ni pra ti_mam b+ha bo hri phat/_a+o~m bi shwa d+ha ki ni pra titsh+tshha me b+ha lo a phat/
analyzed: om pad+ma d+ha ki ni pra ti_mam b+ha bo hri phat/_a+o~m bi shwa d+ha ki ni pra titsh+tshha me b+ha lo a phat/
translated: Oṃ padma-ḍākinī prati-maṃ-bhava-hrīḥ phaṭ🔽Oṃ viśva-ḍākinī prati-maṃ-bhava-lo a phaṭ🔽Oṃ sarva-ḍākinī prati-maṃ-bhava-lo ho phaṭ

original: om sarba d+ha ki ni pra titsh+tshha mam b+ha lo ho phat/_de nas de nyid lnga pas bstod pa ni/_/
analyzed: om sarba d+ha ki ni pra titsh+tshha mam b+ha lo ho phat/_de nas de nyid lnga pas bstod pa ni/_/
translated: Then, the praise with the five suchnesses:🔽Akṣobhya is great wisdom,

original: mi skyod pa ni ye shes che/_/rdo rje dbyings ni mkhas chen po/_/rdo rje gsum
analyzed: mi skyod pa ni ye shes che/_/rdo rje dbyings ni mkhas chen po/_/rdo rje gsum
translated: the great expert of the vajra realm,🔽the supreme three vajras, the three mandalas,

original: mchog dkyil 'khor gsum/_/rdo rje mkha' 'gro phyag 'tshhal lo/_/rnam par
analyzed: mchog dkyil 'khor gsum/_/rdo rje mkha' 'gro phyag 'tshhal lo/_/rnam par
translated: I pay homage to the vajra dakini.🔽Vairocana is the utterly joyful one,

original: snang mdzad rab tu dga'/_/rdo rje zhi ba dga' chen po/_/rang bzhin gyi ni
analyzed: snang mdzad rab tu dga'/_/rdo rje zhi ba dga' chen po/_/rang bzhin gyi ni
translated: the vajra peace, the great joy,🔽the supreme natural luminosity,

original: 'od gsal mchog_/sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro phyag 'tshhal lo/_/rin chen rgyal
analyzed: 'od gsal mchog_/sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro phyag 'tshhal lo/_/rin chen rgyal
translated: I pay homage to the buddha dakini.🔽Ratnasaṃbhava is the very profound one,🔽the vajra space, stainless,

original: po rab tu zab/_/rdo rje nam mkha' dri ma med/_/dngos nyid dag pas gos pa
analyzed: po rab tu zab/_/rdo rje nam mkha' dri ma med/_/dngos nyid dag pas gos pa
translated: unstained by the pure nature,🔽I pay homage to the ratna dakini.

original: med/_/rin chen mkha' 'gro phyag 'tshhal lo/_/rdo rje mi 'chi 'dod chags che//
analyzed: med/_/rin chen mkha' 'gro phyag 'tshhal lo/_/rdo rje mi 'chi 'dod chags che//
translated: Vajra Amitāyus is the great passion,

original: dpal sgyu 'phrul chen mo'i gtor ma'i cho ga
analyzed: dpal sgyu 'phrul chen mo'i gtor ma'i cho ga
translated: The Torma Ritual of the Great Magical Illusion

original: mi rtog nam mkha'i rdo rje 'dzin/_/'dod chags pha rol phyin pa mnyes/_/pad+ma
analyzed: mi rtog nam mkha'i rdo rje 'dzin/_/'dod chags pha rol phyin pa mnyes/_/pad+ma
translated: is pleased by the perfection of desire.🔽I pay homage to the lotus ḍākinī.

original: mkha' 'gro phyag 'tshhal lo/_/rdo rje dag pa gdon mi za/_/bsam pa thams
analyzed: mkha' 'gro phyag 'tshhal lo/_/rdo rje dag pa gdon mi za/_/bsam pa thams
translated: The pure vajra is undeceiving,🔽and all wishes are completely fulfilled.

original: cad yongs rtogs pas/_/sangs rgyas ngo bo nyid las byung /_/sna tshhogs mkha'
analyzed: cad yongs rtogs pas/_/sangs rgyas ngo bo nyid las byung /_/sna tshhogs mkha'
translated: Arising from the essence of buddhahood,🔽I pay homage to the diverse ḍākinī.

original: 'gro phyag 'tshhal lo/_/chos rnams gzugs brnyan lta bu ste/_/dag cing gsal
analyzed: 'gro phyag 'tshhal lo/_/chos rnams gzugs brnyan lta bu ste/_/dag cing gsal
translated: All phenomena are like reflections:🔽pure, clear, and unclouded,🔽ungraspable, and inexpressible.

original: la rnyog pa med/_/bzung du med cing brjod du med/_/rgyu dang las las kun
analyzed: la rnyog pa med/_/bzung du med cing brjod du med/_/rgyu dang las las kun
translated: They arise from causes and karma,🔽lacking essence and abiding nowhere.

original: tu byung /_/ngo bo med cing gnas pa med/_/de ltar chos 'di shes nas kyang /
analyzed: tu byung /_/ngo bo med cing gnas pa med/_/de ltar chos 'di shes nas kyang /
translated: Having understood this nature of phenomena,

analyzed: sems can don ni mnyam med byos/_/'on kyang sangs rgyas rigs su skye/_//
translated: one should engage in the benefit of sentient beings without compare.🔽In such and such a place, the kṣetrapāla,

analyzed: a hum yul che ge mo zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i khe tra pa la i rda b+ha lo g+hin+na sna/_ma

analyzed: ma sa pa ri wa ran pa sarba panany+tsha/_sarba pa pam bya ti bi ga nam shan+tim ku ru/_d+ha na

analyzed: d+ha bya u u ro gyi/_pu ting pu rul sarba b+ha yo rak+sha rak+sha ku ru ku ru swa ha/
translated: puṭiṅ puru sarva bhaya rakṣa rakṣa kuru kuru svāhā.🔽May all sentient beings be free from illness,

analyzed: sems can thams cad nad med cing /_/sems can thams cad bde gyur nas/_/
translated: and may all sentient beings be happy.🔽May they go on the very path

original: sangs rgyas nyid dang 'phrad gyur pa'i/_/lam de nyid du 'gro bar shog_/ma
analyzed: sangs rgyas nyid dang 'phrad gyur pa'i/_/lam de nyid du 'gro bar shog_/ma
translated: that leads to encountering the Buddha.

analyzed: grol ba rnams grol ba dang /_/ma bsgral ba rnams sgrol byed cing /_/rnal
translated: May those who are liberated liberate those who are not liberated,🔽and may the teachings of the yoga

analyzed: 'byor bstan chos gnas pa ni/_/da lta nyid du gnas par shog_/de'i

analyzed: 'og tu yi ge 'bru gsum gyis zhi ba la sogs pa'i las bcol lo/_/de nas om
translated: After that, with the three seed syllables, one should request the activities of pacification and so forth.🔽Then, one should say oṃ

analyzed: a:hum mu zhes brjod/_se gol lan gsum brdabs te gshegs su gsol ba'o//
translated: aḥ hūṃ mu, snap one's fingers three times, and request the departure.🔽The Ritual for the Torma of the Glorious Great Magical Emanation

analyzed: dpal sgyu 'phrul chen mo'i gtor ma'i cho ga_/rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug ku ku ri
